endpoints.description: Retrieve real-time property price trends based on specified criteria.
Access growth statistics for specific neighborhoods including development indicators.
Fetch current market demand analysis for desired property types or locations.
Submit property listing information to get an extensive analytics report.
Provide detailed market insights for selected regions or zones.
Set alerts for properties matching specific price thresholds to monitor price changes.
Analyze the rental market dynamics for tenant demand and pricing trends.
Compare multiple neighborhoods based on predefined growth and demand metrics.
Identify top investment opportunities based on growth indicators and market conditions.
Retrieve reviews and efficiency ratings for real estate service providers.
